    • Uses of GdlRule in org.ggp.base.util.propnet.factory.converter

      Methods in org.ggp.base.util.propnet.factory.converter with parameters of type GdlRule 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void PropNetConverter.convertRule(GdlRule rule)
      Converts a rule into equivalent PropNet Components by invoking the convertHead() method on the head, and the convertConjunct method on every literal in the body and joining the results by an and gate.
      Method parameters in org.ggp.base.util.propnet.factory.converter with type arguments of type GdlRule 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PropNet PropNetConverter.convert(java.util.List<Role> roles, java.util.List<GdlRule> description)
      Converts a game description to a PropNet using the following process (note that this method and all of the methods that it invokes assume that description has already been flattened by a PropNetFlattener): Transforms each of the rules in description into equivalent PropNet Components. Adds or gates to Propositions with more than one input. Adds inputs that are implicitly specified by description.
